description: Try our easy to follow Easy Pepperoni Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Meat pizza,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,High protein,Low sugar
name: Easy Pepperoni Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs basil leaves, to serve (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 230°C / 210°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray or pizza tray with baking paper.
Place pizza base on lined tray. Spread with the pizza sauce. Scatter over the Perfect Pizza cheese. Top with pepperoni slices.
Bake for 15 minutes or until cheese is melted and golden and base is crisp. Serve scattered with basil leaves if you like.
